name: ZombieFlappyBird
description:
This was a game made by me in 2 days! (to see if I can recreate flappy bird)  

Using Gamemaker studio 2 , if you like Flappy bird you'll love this!

Flap your way through the pipes, and beat your highscore!

Because it has the same mechanics. Different code, and art!

Linked below is my Youtube where I will have how I made this up shortly!

I also do free art tutorials there!

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTEEF3Q6KJVAMlZq7-GBcrA
